plot: The issue of possible funeral reform by the Chinese government convinces an elderly woman to have her funeral ahead of time while she is still alive.
title: Xiao zi xian sun ci hou zhe
plot_es: The issue of possible funeral reform by the Chinese government convinces an elderly woman to have her funeral ahead of time while she is still alive.
original_name: Xiao zi xian sun ci hou zhe
plot_en: The issue of possible funeral reform by the Chinese government convinces an elderly woman to have her funeral ahead of time while she is still alive.
